snippet.title: Student sparks Perth measles alert
snippet.content: A Perth school student has returned from overseas with measles, sparking a citywide health alert. While still infectious, the student attended Perth Waldorf School in Bibra Lake after which a "substantial number" of pupils were identified as not having been vaccinated, the WA department of health said on Friday Waldorf, which takes pre- and primary school enrolments, has a metropolitan-wide catchment area, prompting the warning for the entire Perth area. (C) AAP 2017
